description:
Sousuke’s career as an artist’s model gets off to a rough start when he learns he may have to show some skin. And when Kaname is threatened by Yakuza thugs, Sagara uses Bonta-kun to save her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Geijutsu no Hamburger Hill / Ichizu na Stake-Out
Hamburger Hill artistico / Una fedele stake out
La montagne d`arts de hamburgers / Une surveillance exclusive
O Monte Hambúrguer Da Arte! - O Vigia Ingênuo!
The Hamburger Hill of Art / Single Minded Stakeout!
芸術のハンバーガー・ヒル / 一途なステイク・アウト
예술의 햄버거 힐 / 하루만의 스테이크 아웃
